name: OLIVE BRANCH Handmade Soap
description:
FOR YOUR NOSE:
Bright citrus fruits mingled with Bergamot, leafy greenery with soft Musk and every so lightly sweetened with a touch of Vanilla

FOR YOUR SKIN:
My skin loving Olive Oil recipe enriched with Shea Butter, Apricot Kernel Oil and real Silk!
Formulated to produce a mild and luxuriously creamy lather that won't over-strip your skin of it's natural and beneficial oils.

Bars weigh approx.  4.5 oz / 127 g
Each arrives individually wrapped in smell through shrink wrap film and labeled with full list of ingredients 
_____________________________

INGREDIENTS: Water, Saponified oils of Olive, Coconut, Rice Bran, Palm*,  Shea Butter, Castor, Apricot Kernel Oil,  Fragrance, Silk Fibers, Iron Oxide, Mica

*Our Palm Oil is sourced from a member of the Rountable on Sustainable Palm Oil (RSOP) which supports the growth and use of sustainable Palm Oil

name: SWEET TALKER Handmade Soap
description:
FOR YOUR NOSE:
London Lemon Curd whipped with pure sugar cane on a delectable shortbread crust

FOR YOUR SKIN:
My skin loving Olive Oil recipe enriched with Shea Butter and real Silk!
Formulated to produce a mild and luxuriously creamy lather that won't over-strip your skin of it's natural and beneficial oils.

Bars weigh approx.  4.5 oz / 127 g
Each arrives individually wrapped in smell through shrink wrap film and labeled with full list of ingredients 
_____________________________________

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Saponified oils of Olive, Coconut, Rice Bran, Palm*, Shea Butter, Castor, Fragrance Oil, Iron Oxide, Mica

*Our Palm Oil is sourced from a member of the Rountable on Sustainable Palm Oil (RSOP) which supports the growth and use of sustainable Palm Oil

name: JADE Handmade Soap
description:
According to the ancient Chinese, Jade represented many of their most valued attributes and signifies harmony and the concentrated essence of love.

FOR YOUR NOSE
A beautifully fresh scent with Sweet Jasmine, White lilies and Violets with middle notes of Lavender and Rose combined with a delicate touch of sun ripened pineapple with bottom notes of Apple and Melon

FOR YOUR SKIN:
My skin loving Olive Oil recipe enriched with Shea Butter, Avocado Oil and real Silk!
Formulated to produce a mild and luxuriously creamy lather that won't over-strip your skin of it's natural and beneficial oils.

Bars weigh approx. 4.5 oz / 127 g
Each arrives individually wrapped in smell through shrink wrap film and labeled with full list of ingredients 
_____________________________

INGREDIENTS: Water, Saponified oils of Olive, Coconut, Rice Bran, Palm*,  Shea Butter, Castor, Avocado, Fragrance, Silk Fibers, Iron Oxides, Mica

*Our Palm Oil is sourced from a member of the Rountable on Sustainable Palm Oil (RSOP) which supports the growth and use of sustainable Palm Oil

name: MAGIC DETOX  *Activated Charcoal & Tea Tree Oil* Handmade Soap
description:
An All Natural Detox soap that is fresh smelling with Activated Charcoal and Tea Tree Essential Oil. A great essential oil blend keeps this soap from smelling overly medicinal.

An ideal choice for oily/combination skin types and suitable for facial use as well.

•Activated Bamboo Charcoal -  beneficial in drawing impurities and toxins out of the skin helping to relieve acne and other skin problems

•Tea Tree Oil a.k.a. Natures Magic Ingredient - has antibacterial, anti-fungal and antiviral properties with much less irritation to the skin than over the counter acne remedies

Chunky bars weigh approx. 5.0 oz / 140 g
Bars come wrapped in our signature bands and labeled with full list of ingredients
_____________________________

INGREDIENTS: Water, Saponified oils of Olive, Coconut, Avocado, Palm*, Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Castor, Essential Oil Blend, Activated Charcoal

*Our Palm Oil is sourced from a member of the Rountable on Sustainable Palm Oil (RSOP) which supports the growth and use of sustainable Palm Oil

name: Real CASTILE Soap
description:
100% Olive Oil Castile Soap

Soap doesn't get any milder than this! Pure Castile soap is known for it's gentle and conditioning slick lather. 

Perfect for babies and persons with sensitive skin.

•Unscented
•Uncolored

Pure & Simple Soap

Approx. 4.5 oz / 127 g
_____________________________

INGREDIENTS: Water, Saponified Olive Oil

name: PUMICE Foot Spa Natural Soap
description:
Clean & Soften your feet all at once with this natural handmade Pumice Soap.  

Handmade with the same skin loving ingredients as our other soaps but with the added benefits of finely ground Pumice, Cocoa Butter and French Green Clay.  Helps to gently remove dead skin without drying out your skin.

Although made especially for the feet, try using for thick dry scaly patches on elbows and knees and this soap also works like the old “Lava” soap for extra dirty hands 

Approx. 4.5 oz / 127 g
Each handmade soap arrives individually wrapped in smell through shrink wrap film and labeled with full list of ingredients 
_____________________________

INGREDIENTS: Water, Saponified oils of Olive, Coconut, Rice Bran, Palm*,  Cocoa Butter, Castor, Finely Ground Pumice, French Green Clay, Fragrance/Essential Oil Blend

*Our Palm Oil is sourced from a member of the Rountable on Sustainable Palm Oil (RSOP) which supports the growth and use of sustainable Palm Oil

name: PINE TAR All Natural Handmade Soap
description:
Pine Tar has been used for years as an all-natural remedy for skin conditions such as rashes, eczema, psoriasis, poison ivy and sunburn. 

Our old fashioned soap recipe contains 20% pine tar, which is the most that it can possibly contain, giving this bar ultimate therapeutic properties.

Formulated to mildly cleanse without over-stripping already irritated and sensitive skin.

This soap has no fragrance added, however the soap does have a strong natural scent from the pine tar.

Approx. 4.5 oz / 127 g
_____________________________

INGREDIENTS: Water, Saponified oils of Olive, Coconut, Pine Tar, Cocoa Butter, Castor, Palm*

*Our Palm Oil is sourced from a member of the Rountable on Sustainable Palm Oil (RSOP) which supports the growth and use of sustainable Palm Oil

name: ARCADIA All-Natural Soap
description:
Heaven for your skin...

For this luxuriously decadent soap, we've taken our Olive Oil recipe and jam packed it full of wonderful, nourishing food for your skin. 
 
This unscented, all natural soap is a triple milk combination of Buttermilk, Heavy Cream and Goat Milk, lots of raw Cocoa Butter, unrefined Shea Butter and Avocado Oil, Colloidal Oatmeal for it's gentle soothing properties, Silk Fibers for added "silkiness", and Bentonite Clay which adds a lovely "slip" to the lather making this soap ideal for shaving as well!

Bars weigh over 3.8 oz / 107 g
Bars come wrapped in our signature bands and labeled with full list of ingredients
_____________________________________

Ingredients: Buttermilk, Heavy Cream, Goat Milk, Saponified oils of Olive, Coconut, Palm*, Rice Bran, Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Avocado, Castor, Cocoa Powder, Colloidal Oatmeal, Bentonite Clay, Silk Fibers

*Our Palm Oil is sourced from a member of the Rountable on Sustainable Palm Oil (RSOP) which supports the growth and use of sustainable Palm Oil

name: ARCADIA Jumbo Bath Bomb
description:
This all natural Bath Bomb is a luxurious combination of Goat Milk & Buttermilk,  packed with lots of raw Cocoa Butter, unrefined Shea Butter and Colloidal Oatmeal.

The ARCADIA bath bomb is perfect for babies, persons with sensitive skin or anyone who just wants a super soothing bathing experience!

For a Relaxing Bath:
Simply drop the whole Bath Bomb into your bath water to release the skin softening butters and oils

Each handmade bath bomb weighs approx. 7.5 oz / 112 grams

WHAT'S IN IT? - sodium bicarbonate (baking soda), citric acid (derived from citrus fruits), kaolin clay, cocoa butter, shea butter, colloidal oatmeal, apricot kernel oil

name: COCO MINT Bath Bomb
description:
FOR YOUR NOSE:
Hot Cocoa with a delicious blend of Hazelnut, Toffee and Vanilla with a cooling swirl of sweet Peppermint Leaf

For a Relaxing Bath:
Simply drop the whole Bath Bomb into your bath water. As it fizzes it's delicious aroma is released into the room while the skin softening oils and butters are released into the water

Each bath bomb weighs just over 5 oz / 141 grams

WHAT'S IN IT? - sodium bicarbonate (baking soda), citric acid (derived from citrus fruits), kaolin clay, cocoa butter, shea butter, polysorbate, apricot kernel oil, cocoa powder, fragrance oil, liquid silk, mica

name: FOOTSIES Pumice Stone
description:
Treat your feet with this foot shaped pumice stone.  Fits perfectly in the hand.

Pumice is a light weight stone that has excellent abrasive qualities which makes it perfect for removing dry hard skin from the bottom of your feet. 

Can also be used to gently exfoliate elbows and heels.  
Try pairing with our FOOT SPA Pumice Soap.

name: BLUE SUGAR Body Custard
description:
FOR YOUR NOSE:
Pure Vanilla with a juicy citrus center on a sensual base of Sugared Musk and exotic woods

FOR YOUR SKIN:
A deep rich butter cream formulated with the triple treat of  Cocoa, Mango & Shea Butters with the added benefits of Cupuacu Butter
 
These butters have been shown to help certain skin conditions and ailments, while offering additional elasticity and conditioning properties

Cupuaçu Butter is used as a vegetable alternative to lanolin, with good barrier function to moisture loss from the skin
_____________________________________

4 oz / 113 g Jar 

**This is NOT a whipped frosting but instead has the consistency of a delectably rich custard.** 

Glides on smooth and absorbs easily
No need to constantly re-apply.  A little goes a long way!

-100% VEGAN
-PARABEN FREE
-Proven Effective Natural Preservative System
-Contains Organic and Sustainable Ingredients

name: Natural Laundry Soap Powder - Detergent Free
description:
This handmade Laundry Soap Powder is a safe and effective way to get your entire family's clothes clean! All natural and best of all: detergent free!  A great alternative to commercial laundry detergents.

• Natural & Biodegradable
    Contains no detergents or foam boosters
 
• Ideal for Babies and persons with Sensitive Skin & Allergies
    Great for Clothe Diapers!

• Safe for HE Machines 

1lb Resealable Bag of Natural Soap Powder. Includes measuring scoop.
Yields approx. 32 loads
Use 1 Tbsp. for regular wash or 2 Tbsp. for heavy soiled laundry

This is a concentrated laundry soap.  Not intended for use on the skin.

DID YOU KNOW: Suds come from chemicals/foaming agents added to the kind of detergent you buy at the supermarket because marketing specialists found that consumers believe suds = clean? Please DO NOT be fooled by this misleading marketing ploy!

name: Mini TEALIGHT Wax Tart Warmers
description:
Our mini ceramic tealight warmers are a great way to enjoy your favorite scents and are the perfect size for our Mini Wax Tarts.

TO USE:
Place your fragrance oil or wax tart in the bowl section of tart warmer and light your tea light

Your melt will start melting in a few minutes. Melted wax is what throws fragrance. Sit back and enjoy.  Replace tea light as needed. Wax can be reheated over and over until fragrance is gone

After cooling and the wax has hardened. you can change fragrance by popping out the old wax. If you like, you can store the old wax in a baggy for re-use in the future

name: PUMPKIN CHEESECAKE Wax Tart Melts
description:
FOR YOUR NOSE:
Cardamom, ground cinnamon, Vermont maple, pumpkin puree, cream cheese, and caramelized sugar topped with vanilla whipped cream

Our highly scented Wax Melt Tarts are a safe way to enjoy hours of of your favorite bath & body scents beyond the tub. 

TO USE: simply break off a chunk or two of wax and place in your electric or tealight warmer. Because the tarts have no flame in direct contact with the wax, the scent will disperse quickly and cover a wider area.

2 oz package contains six melts

name: RUBY RED Wax Melt Tarts
description:
